definitions.definition: A long or larger molecule consisting of a chain or network of many repeating units, formed by chemically bonding together many identical or similar small molecules called monomers . A polymer is formed by polymerization , the joining of many monomer molecules.
A material consisting of such polymer molecules.

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) A long or larger molecule consisting of a chain or network of many repeating units, formed by chemically bonding together many identical or similar small molecules called monomers . A polymer is formed by polymerization , the joining of many monomer molecules.
secondary_definitions: A material consisting of such polymer molecules.
